== Main Inclusion Report for tangerine-icon-theme ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** The package is available in Ubuntu universe http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/t/tango-icon-theme-common, arch: all.
 0. ''Rationale:''  
** This package contains icons that were split out of `tangerine-icon-theme` to give users of `tango-icon-theme` (Xubuntu, etc) the possibility to have user contributed icons as well.
** Gives the Ubuntu Art team a chance to participate in the Desktop of the future.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** No CVEs or other security issues.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** No bugs.
** We are upstream.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard CDBS packaging
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** icon-naming-utils was approved as Build-Dependency already, just needs to be used in main again.
